### getAnalysisUsage() {#a62d3eccd9992d21281a8a354bfe4074b}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the MachineBasicBlock CFG.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#l01995">1995</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp">MachineSink.cpp</a>.

This usually implemented in terms of the name that is registered by one of the Registration templates, but can be overloaded directly.

### ModifiedRegUnits {#af8e690ae01509958358d14ca7ae66cb2}

Track which register units have been modified and used.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#l02007">2007</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp">MachineSink.cpp</a>.

### SeenDbgInstrs {#ae39c7ccf6e16e39a4e383723571e73dd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;unsigned, SmallVector&lt;MIRegs, 2&gt; &gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;MachineSink.cpp&#125;::PostRAMachineSinking::SeenDbgInstrs</>}>
Track DBG&#95;VALUEs of (unmodified) register units.

Each DBG&#95;VALUE has an entry in this map for each unit it touches. The DBG&#95;VALUE&#39;s entry consists of a pointer to the instruction itself, and a vector of registers referred to by the instruction that overlap the key register unit.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#l02013">2013</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp">MachineSink.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
